div.div: Amplitudes of the oscillations of zonal-mean quantities.
div.p: ( a) Shows the amplitude of zonal-mean TSI for O B (blue) and O P (red) as a function of latitude, ( b) the amplitude of zonal-mean surface temperature, ( c) the amplitude of the zonal-mean OLR and ( d) the amplitude of the zonal-mean precipitation. The temporal spectrum was taken over 10,800 Earth-days in steady state. Note that the horizontal axes are scaled with the cosine of latitude.
